articles.description: Come on and slam, and yell at new Space Jam
articles.content:
Image: Warner Bros. Pictures
Pedants and mega-nerds, look away now: Space Jam: A New Legacy had a lovely Game Boy cameo, and in a shocking turn of events, people on the internet are up in arms about… [+3471 chars]
